content: 36 row have been worked in total next r is rs see chart below for st counts left left right right total size back front sleeve sleeve front sts xs 42 48 88 48 42 268 s 42 50 88 50 42 272 m 44 50 92 50 44 280 l 42 48 92 48 42 272 xl 42 42 100 42 42 268 2xl 40 40 100 40 40 260 3xl 48 56 100 56 48 308 4xl 50 56 104 56 50 316 5xl 50 56 104 56 50 316 only sizes l xl 2xl in the next section there are increases to shape the sleeves on every 4th row and at the same time the neck on every 2nd row work as follows r1 k2 m1l k to m sm m1l k to m m1r sm k to m sm m1l k to m m1r sm k to last 2 sts m1r k2 6 sts added r2 p to end slipping markers as you go r3 k2 m1l k to m sm k to m sm k to m sm k to m sm k to last 2 sts m1r k2 2 sts added r4 p to end slipping markers as you go repeat r1-4 until - - - 4 12 16 - - - row have been worked in total next r is rs 5 knitting of course milo see chart below for st counts left left right right total size back front sleeve sleeve front sts xs 42 48 88 48 42 268 s 42 50 88 50 42 272 m 44 50 92 50 44 280 l 44 50 92 50 44 280 xl 48 48 100 48 48 292 2xl 48 48 100 48 48 292 3xl 48 56 100 56 48 308 4xl 50 56 104 56 50 316 5xl 50 56 104 56 50 316 all sizes begin stripes here start with cc carry your yarn when working stripes on every 2nd row twist the yarn you want to carry up and over the working yarn https //www youtube com/watch v=ncz79k8hq6u in the next section there are increases to shape only the sleeves on every 4th row work as follows r1 k to m sm m1l k to m m1r sm k to m sm m1l k to m m1r sm k to end 4 sts added r2 p to end slipping markers as you go r3 k to end slipping markers as you go r4 p to end slipping markers as you go repeat r1-4 until 20 12 12 8 16 16 8 12 4 row have been worked in total next r is rs see chart below for st counts left left right right total size back front sleeve sleeve front sts xs 42 58 88 58 42 288 s 42 56 88 56 42 284 m 44 56 92 56 44 292 l 44 54 92 54 44 288 xl 48 56 100 56 48 308 2xl 48
